sections.summary: experienced, detail-oriented accountant who effectively manages multiple projects, and possesses superior organizational and communication skills is seeking a challenging position.
sections.skills: accounting, accountant, accounting software, accounts payable, accounts receivable, billing, budgets, cash management, closing, contracts, draw, cost analysis, credit, financial accounting, financial reporting, financial statements, forecasting, general ledger, grants, job costing, ms office suite, office, payroll, pivot tables, processes, recording, sage, taxes, tax returns, verbal communication skills, written
